General.Name: Mountain Boy Minerals Ltd
General.Description: MTB Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, and other metals. It holds interest in the Barbara and Surprise Creek, Red Cliff, American Creek project, Southmore, Telegraph, and Theia projects. The company was formerly known as Mountain Boy Minerals Ltd. and changed its name to MTB Metals Corp. in March 2023. MTB Metals Corp. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 325 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1Z7
